{{Actor| | type = Decoration | name = Small pillar | class = SmallPillar | game = Heretic | doomednum = 29 }}[[Classes]]: SmallPillar
A small stone pillar with four sculpted demon faces (only one of which faces the player on the sprite). ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SmallPillar { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 34 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: SMPL A -1 Stop } }
